message: I can't log into my account after the latest update. It says my password is incorrect.

The app crashes every time I try to open it on my Android phone.
I need a refund for my last order. The item was defective.
How do I change my email address associated with my account?
I received the wrong item in my order. Can I get a replacement?
The website is not loading properly on my laptop. It keeps showing a 404 error.
Can you help me reset my password? I forgot it and can't access my account.
I want to cancel my subscription, but I can't find the option in my account settings.

I am having trouble with the payment gateway. It keeps rejecting my card.
The delivery of my order is delayed. Can you provide an update?
I want to report a bug in the latest version of the app.

Can you explain the features of the premium plan? I'm considering upgrading.
I received a notification about a security breach. What should I do?
The search function on the website is not working. It returns no results for any query.
